String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Interval in seconds after which the entity state is rechecked.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Returns true at the first start and if the entity value in DB is changed. Otherwise, returns false.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Once in recheckPeriod checks whether the entity in DB is changed. At the first start returns true and saves the current time. If the lastUpdateTime value is changed or if the record is not found in DB, rereads the entity object (if the object is deleted, catches the exception), returns true. If the object is reread and then deleted from DB, returns true.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Object allows to get the time when the DB table is last updated. For details, see Radix::Utils::ILastUpdateTimeGetter.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Interval during which the entity is stored in cache.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Time of the last cache refresh in seconds.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: The time interval in seconds, after which the entity state will be rechecked.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: The time interval during which the entity will be stored in the cache.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Constructor for the Radix::Utils::Caching class. The values of the corresponding elements of Radix::Common::CachingPeriod enum are used as the values of the recheckPeriod and keepPeriod parameters.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Previous time of the cache update.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Object allows to get the time when the DB table is last updated. For details, see Radix::Utils::ILastUpdateTimeGetter.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: If this parameter is true, the entity is refreshed immediately. If the parameter is false, the entity was refreshed after recheckPeriod.

String.Creator: dlastochkin
String.Value: Returns true at the first start and if the entity in DB is changed. Otherwise, returns false.

String.Creator: akrylov
String.Value: Once in recheckPeriod checks whether the entity in DB is changed. At the first start returns true and saves the current time. If the lastUpdateTime value is changed or if the record is not found in DB, rereads the entity object (if the object is deleted, catches the exception), returns true. If the object is reread and then deleted from DB, returns true.
